name: Apple Thunderbolt 4 Pro Cable 3m
description: Apple's longest Thunderbolt 4 cable at 3m. Features 40Gbps, 100W charging, and daisy-chain support. When you need distance without compromises.

reviews.review_text: 3m TB4 at full speed. Only option.
Apple tax but it actually works.
Expensive but unique in the market.
